frontMatter.title: Automatically prefix commit message with Git hook
frontMatter.summary: In order to find all the commits relating to a specific JIRA issue as well as find the issue relating to a specific commit quickly, my team applies a common pattern for all commit message in our projects: `[ISSUE] MESSAGE`
